summary: Each year, we make more than 1,000 recommendations to help the federal government save money, address issues on our High Risk List, and significantly improve government operations. This letter to the Department of Defense outlines 90 open recommendations that it should prioritize, including 6 that address barracks and privatized housing. For example, DOD should clarify its guidance on minimum health and safety standards for barracks...
title: Priority Open Recommendations: Department of Defense
